item.title: She provides the raw material to Trump’s influencer machine
item.description: Margo Martin, a lesser-known member of the president’s staff, fuels social media with a blitz of Trump content.

item.title: Trump is reconstituting the Fine Arts panel set to review his ballroom
item.description: The White House is seeking members likely to clear the way for President Donald Trump’s controversial ballroom and other projects.

item.title: White House lays out nine-week timeline to win approval for Trump’s ballroom
item.description: Trump is seeking to gain approvals for his ballroom in just over two months that have taken other large projects years to complete.

item.title: Chief justice says rule of law is strong at time of rising concerns
item.description: Chief Justice John Roberts said in his annual year-end report on the judiciary that the nation’s founding charters remain robust.

item.title: Longtime MAGA ally Boebert lashes out at Trump over veto
item.description: The Colorado Republican said she hopes Trump’s action on a water infrastructure bill benefiting her district “has nothing to do with political retalia...
